description: Tips for the biggest travel day of the year, including readying your car for the trip, navigating the airport and where to celebrate if youâ€™re leaving the United States.
title: Your Guide to Thanksgiving Travel
title_page: Your Guide to Thanksgiving Travel - The New York Times
text: Stuck at the terminal? These stories about settlers and Indians may help you pass the time. One writer follows in the footsteps of Hannah Duston, who was victim and victor in a skirmish in a war she never meant to fight in. Another hangs out with the Indians who live at the base of the Grand Canyon and gets an unsparing look at the ways that we interact with the people who once were the sole residents of this land.
